page.title: 17F of D News 3
page.content: A{Cinderford}man remembers sighting {Halleys Comet}in 1910.He was 14 years old at the time.He hopes to see it again 12th December.It is not expected to be such a good sighting as the one in 1910.Because we are not in the right Hemisphere.There are also other Comets in the sky.A special display about{Halleys Comet}in 1066 can be seen in{Gloucester}City Museum.It was much brighter then_it was seen by the people then as an omen of bad fortune.The Comet only returns every {76_78 years.A computer will help you to find out where to look in the sky for the Comet beetween now and Febuary 1986.The weather forecast on television also helps you to find out where the comet is at the moment.
